system.requirements: Kroot, RT Rank 3+, Leader of at least 10+ other Kroot as part of a Kindred.

description.value:
The Kroot begins to lead their Kindred in how best to choose their diets in order to safely shape their genes. They also gain access to shamanic powers to bless their allies and kin with good fortune and fighting spirit.

Effects: Replace new Rank's Advances with that of the Kroot Shaper Gain unique traits Instinctual Understanding and Shamanic Powers.
